spa_services.name: HydraFacial
spa_services.description: The invigorating treatment includes deeply cleansing, exfoliating, and extracting and impurities from the skin while simultaneously infusing nourishing ingredients to hydrate the skin.

spa_services.name: SkinPen Microneedling
spa_services.description: Microneedling is safe for all skin types and promotes care-free healing to address acne scars, fine lines, and wrinkles. It can also be used to decrease the appearance of stretch marks. It's a fast and safe method that initiates the production of collagen and elastin in your skin.

spa_services.name: PERFECT DERMA PEEL
spa_services.description: The Perfect Derma Peel is a chemical peel that treats all skin concerns. This is a 7 day peel that brightens and clarifies the skin. The peel comes with a post peel kit to protect and soothe your skin during the peeling process.

spa_services.name: BioRePeel
spa_services.description: An innovative treatment peel that dissolves bonds between cells that carefully removes the top layer of skin revealing the glowing smooth layer underneath.

spa_services.name: Deep Cleansing Facial
spa_services.description: A deep cleansing facial is a treatment that thoroughly cleanses your pores and removes impurities from your skin. It can be ideal for people with all types of skin who want a thorough, deep face cleanse.

spa_services.name: Dermaplaning Facial
spa_services.description: Dermaplaning is a safe, non-invasive treatment that uses a medical blade to gently exfoliate your skin. This process removes dead, dulling skin cells as well as peach fuzz, leaving your face softer and smoother than ever before.

reviews.name: Pablo Castro
reviews.reviewText: My experience at Reluxe has been amazing. Manuela is very professional and knowledgeable. Her facials are very relaxing and the results are great. After seeing her and following a treatment plan, I am more confident in my skin. I recommend everyone to invest in their skin and go visit Manuela. The clinic is very clean and the staff is really friendly.

reviews.name: Pablo Castro
reviews.reviewText: I was super impressed with the care and attention I received at my mole removal appointment on Saturday . Staff welcomed me in with a friendly smile. First Impressions count so much! Manuela was very tentative and thorough on explaining with detail what she was doing and what  she was going to do on my face. I felt relaxed and at ease. I was pretty impressed with the final result.I asked so much questions as I was concern but she always replied politely and explained me quite well with the things. Thanks Again Manuela your Amazing session.I definitely will recommend you to my other friends for other treatments. Thanks alot

reviews.name: Pablo Castro
reviews.reviewText: Very good experience  everyone are very experienced they know there work i am really  happy.
